awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE SKAGWAY VILLAGE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.  SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL GATHER BASELINE ENVIRONMENTAL DATA; BEGIN A RECYCLING PROGRAM; CREATE A GAP DESK GUIDE FOR TRIBAL STAFF AND UPDATE THE ETEP.

DESCRIPTION:THE SKAGWAY TRADITIONAL COUNCIL WILL BUILD THEIR ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM THROUGH GATHERING BASELINE WATER AND AIR QUALITY DATA, INCREASE AWARENESS OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AMONG THE COMMUNITY AND YOUTH, AND TO PROMOTE STEWARDSHIP; EXPAND CLIMATE CHANGE DATA COLLECTION STRATEGIES.ACTIVITIES:THE SKAGWAY TRADITIONAL COUNCIL WILL CONTINUE WATER QUALITY SAMPLING. THEY WILL CREATE OUTREACH MATERIALS FOR INCLUSION IN THE QUARTERLY NEWSLETTER TO EDUCATE COMMUNITY ON VARIOUS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND STC PROGRAMS; DEVELOP CURRICULUM RELATING TO SALMON FOR CLASSROOM EDUCATION. SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE; COPIES OF FIELD DATA, OUTREACH MATERIALS TO EPA; INCREASED AWARENESS OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; MEETING AND RESEARCH NOTES. DEVELOPMENT OF A GEOSPATIAL DATA COLLECTION QAPP.   DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS GRANT ARE MEMBERS OF THE TRIBE.
